mapper.insert: insert into news (id, title, content, association_id, user_id, create_time, state) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{association_id}, #{user_id}, #{create_time}, #{state})
mapper.update: update news set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, begin_time=#{begin_time}, end_time=#{end_time}, state=#{state} where id=#{id}
